list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pungent, hot-tasting powder prepared from dried and ground peppercorns, commonly used as a spice or condiment to flavor food.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: season to taste with salt and pepper
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mùa để nếm với muối và hạt tiêu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a capsicum, especially a sweet pepper.
a climbing vine with berries that are dried as black or white peppercorns.
a practice game in which fielders throw at close range to a batter who hits back to the fielders.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I salted and peppered the beef before I browned it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi muối và tiêu thịt bò trước khi tôi nâu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover or fill with a liberal amount of scattered items.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the script is peppered with four-letter words
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kịch bản bị tiêu với bốn chữ cái
